fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Burning sensation during urination, frequent urination, urgency, cloudy urine.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: More common in women, history of previous UTIs.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Infection in any part of the urinary system.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Monitor for symptoms of pyelonephritis, follow up if symptoms persist
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Difficulty starting urination, weak stream, nocturia.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Enlargement of the prostate gland causing urinary symptoms.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Enlarged, non-tender prostate on digital rectal exam.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up to monitor symptom progression, PSA testing as indicated
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Severe pain in the side and back, below the ribs, pain on urination, pink, red, or brown urine.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Hard deposits made of minerals and salts forming inside the kidneys.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Costovertebral angle tenderness on the affected side.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Drink plenty of water, dietary modifications
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Ultrasound or CT follow-up, evaluate for metabolic disorders if recurrent
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Trouble getting or keeping an erection firm enough for sex.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Can be due to a problem with blood flow, nerve supply, or hormones.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Physical exam typically normal; may assess secondary sexual characteristics.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Counseling for psychological causes, manage underlying disease
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Review medications that may contribute to ED, consider specialist referral if no improvement
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Difficulty urinating, blood in semen, erectile dysfunction.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Cancer that occurs in the prostate gland.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Prostate may be asymmetrical or have nodules on digital rectal examination.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular PSA testing, monitor for signs of metastasis
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Discuss treatment options, side effects, and impact on quality of life
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Pelvic pain, pressure, and discomfort related to the bladder, along with urinary frequency and urgency.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Unknown cause, potentially associated with autoimmune reactions or hereditary factors.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A chronic disease characterized by bladder pressure, bladder pain, and sometimes pelvic pain.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tenderness on bladder palpation, no specific findings.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Diet modification, pain management, bladder instillations
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up, symptom diary to identify flare triggers
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Urinary urgency, with or without urge incontinence, usually with frequency and nocturia.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Unknown cause, may be associated with neurological disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A disease where the bladder muscle contracts involuntarily, causing frequent and urgent need to urinate.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Physical exam typically normal; focused on ruling out other causes.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Bladder training, pelvic floor exercises, anticholinergic medications
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Evaluate efficacy of treatment, adjust as needed, consider neuromodulation for refractory cases
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Pain in the groin, painful urination, difficulty urinating, and flu-like symptoms.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can be caused by bacterial infection or non-infectious disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tender and swollen prostate on digital rectal examination.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Benign prostatic hyperplasia, urinary tract infection
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Antibiotics for bacterial prostatitis, alpha-blockers, anti-inflammatory medications
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Monitor symptoms, adjust treatment based on bacterial culture results
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Decreased urine stream, straining to urinate, spraying of urine stream, urinary retention.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can result from injury, infection, surgery, or inflammation.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A narrowing of the urethra caused by scarring.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Physical exam may reveal a decreased flow of urine.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Urethral dilation, urethroplasty, or endoscopic urethrotomy
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid catheterizations and urethral instrumentation when possible
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Follow-up to monitor for recurrence, post-operative care if surgery is performed
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Lump or enlargement in either testicle, a feeling of heaviness in the scrotum, dull ache in the abdomen or groin.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Risk factors include undescended testicle, family history, and age.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A cancer that originates in the testicles, typically affecting younger men.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Palpable mass in the testicle, with or without pain.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Surgical removal of the affected testicle, possibly followed by radiation or chemotherapy
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Counselling on fertility preservation, psychological support
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Scrotal pain, swelling, tenderness, and warmth; fever; and sometimes discharge from the penis.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Most commonly caused by bacterial infection or sexually transmitted infections.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Swollen, tender epididymis on palpation; possible hydrocele.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Rest, scrotal support, and follow-up to ensure resolution of infection
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Educate on STI prevention and the importance of completing antibiotic therapy
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Testicular swelling, pain, tenderness, nausea, and fever.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can be caused by bacterial infections or viral mumps infection.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation of one or both testicles.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Swollen, tender testis; erythema of the scrotal skin.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Supportive care, antibiotics for bacterial causes, analgesics
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Bed rest, ice packs, scrotal elevation
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Monitor for improvement, advise on vaccination against mumps
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Sudden severe testicular pain, swelling, abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Most common in adolescents, can occur after physical activity or trauma.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Twisting of the spermatic cord cutting off blood supply to the testicle.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: High-riding testicle, abnormal testicle position, absent cremasteric reflex.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Emergency surgery to untwist the spermatic cord
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Surgical fixation of both testicles to prevent recurrence
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Educate on recognizing symptoms for immediate attention
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Blood in urine, frequent urination, painful urination, urinary urgency.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Risk factors include smoking, exposure to chemicals, and chronic irritation of the bladder lining.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Cancer that begins in the cells of the bladder.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Physical exam typically normal; findings based on cystoscopy and imaging.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: UTI, benign prostatic hyperplasia, kidney stones
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring for recurrence, manage side effects of treatment
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Penile curvature, pain during erections, erectile dysfunction.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Caused by fibrous scar tissue developing inside the penis.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A disease that leads to a curved, sometimes painful erection.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Palpable plaque within the penile shaft, curvature noted during erection.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Oral medications, injections into the penis, surgery in severe cases
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Pain management, use of vacuum devices for erection aid
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Follow-up to monitor progression, discuss surgical options if necessary
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Pain in the groin, pelvic area, or genitals, and sometimes urinary symptoms such as burning sensation during urination or urgency.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Occurs in men of all ages but most commonly in men younger than 50.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation or infection of the prostate gland.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tender and swollen prostate on digital rectal examination, may have discomfort or pain.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH), urinary tract infection (UTI), bladder cancer
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Antibiotics for bacterial prostatitis, alpha-blockers, anti-inflammatory medications for chronic prostatitis
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Warm baths, pelvic floor exercises, avoid irritants such as caffeine and spicy foods
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up to assess response to treatment, adjust therapy as needed, and manage chronic symptoms
fields.label: Accurex Message
